question: Benasree Sengupta, who passed away recently, was the noted singer from which state?
explanation: Banasree Sengupta (71), the renowned Bengali singer, has recently passed away in  Kolkata, West Bengal. She was known for her mellifluous voice. Some of her hit songs are Aaj Bikeler Dake Tomar Chhithi Pelam, Amar Angey Jaley Rangmoshal, Chhi chhi Eki Kando Korechi, Dur Akashay Tomar Sur, etc. She also lent her voice to Bengali, Hindi, Assamese and Odia films.
